message.text: Give you nothing in the inventory, generate a step-by-step plan to obtain diamonds.

generation:
Step 1: Gather basic materials such as wood, stone, and iron.
Step 2: Craft essential tools like a wooden pickaxe, stone pickaxe, iron pickaxe, and iron shovel.
Step 3: Mine iron ore with the wooden pickaxe to obtain iron ingots.
Step 4: Craft an iron pickaxe and iron shovel.
Step 5: Locate a suitable mining area, preferably near lava.
Step 6: Dig down to a depth of approximately 11-16 blocks above bedrock level.
Step 7: Create a branch mine at this depth.
Step 8: Mine systematically, covering at least 3 blocks in each direction.
Step 9: Use the iron pickaxe to mine stone blocks
Step 10: Identify diamond ore blocks (blue with white specks) in the stone.
Step 11: Use an iron pickaxe to mine the diamond ore blocks.
Step 12: Collect the diamonds and continue mining to find more.

content.text: Give you nothing in the inventory, generate a step-by-step plan to obtain diamonds.

post_conv.content:
Step 1: Gather basic materials such as wood, stone, and iron.
Step 2: Craft essential tools like a wooden pickaxe, stone pickaxe, iron pickaxe, and iron shovel.
Step 3: Mine iron ore with the wooden pickaxe to obtain iron ingots.
Step 4: Craft an iron pickaxe and iron shovel.
Step 5: Locate a suitable mining area, preferably near lava.
Step 6: Dig down to a depth of approximately 11-16 blocks above bedrock level.
Step 7: Create a branch mine at this depth.
Step 8: Mine systematically, covering at least 3 blocks in each direction.
Step 9: Use the iron pickaxe to mine stone blocks
Step 10: Identify diamond ore blocks (blue with white specks) in the stone.
Step 11: Use an iron pickaxe to mine the diamond ore blocks.
Step 12: Collect the diamonds and continue mining to find more.
